CustomField.description: This is the Account associated with this contact. Use the lookup field to select from the available accounts. This applies to all contact types. If you can't find the right account, go ahead and create it. If this contact has changed companies, update to the new account for that company.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the Account associated with this contact. Use the lookup field to select from the available accounts. This applies to all contact types. If you can't find the right account, go ahead and create it. If this contact has changed companies, update to the new account for that company.
